Table_C_Rows.row_name: What is the status of the tailings line containment trench?
Inspect all conductivity probes - immediately report any irregularities or signs of flow - confirm probe active through control.
Clear build up in conductivity probe inspection hole, ensure cover is in place.
Check containment liner is attached to the bridge and not damaged.
Is there damage to the containment liner / cover along corridor?

Table_C1_Rows.row_name: Flow rate m3/h at process plant
Indication of any damage (caused by mobile equipment).
Are the discharge points flowing freely?
# Spigots in operation. (Show location on tailings map)
Indicate the number of spigot - E1-last or W1-last starting from vacuum breaker shack.

items.text: var getCurrentFieldValue = function(root, id, globalValues) {  for (var key in globalValues) { if(globalValues.hasOwnProperty(id)) return globalValues[id]; };}
